settings.title: About - Jeff Lin
settings.description: Learn more about Jeff Lin, a designer and developer focused on creating thoughtful digital experiences.

content.Headline: Designer, developer, and lifelong learner.
content.Subheadline: I create digital experiences that are thoughtful, functional, and built to last. With over a decade of experience, I've helped startups and established companies alike bring their ideas to life.

content.Headline: My Story
content.Content:
The Beginning

I started my journey in design and development over ten years ago, driven by a curiosity about how things work and a desire to create. What began as tinkering with websites in my spare time evolved into a passion for crafting digital experiences.

Philosophy

I believe great design is invisible. It should feel natural, intuitive, and effortless. Every project I take on is guided by this principle â€” removing friction, not adding complexity.

Today

Now I work with a select group of clients who value quality over quantity. Whether it's a complete brand overhaul or a focused product sprint, I bring the same level of care and attention to every engagement.

content.Headline: A track record of results.
content.Subheadline: Some highlights from my work over the years.

Stats.text: Years of experience in design and development.

content.Headline: Let's work together.
content.Subheadline: Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it.
